metadata.title: CVE-2023-45918 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
ncurses 6.4-20230610 has a NULL pointer dereference in tgetstr intinfo/lib_termcap.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lib32ncurses6 - 6.4+20231209-1
lib32ncursesw6 - 6.4+20231209-1
lib32tinfo6 - 6.4+20231209-1
lib64ncurses6 - 6.4+20231209-1
lib64ncursesw6 - 6.4+20231209-1
lib64tinfo6 - 6.4+20231209-1
libncurses6 - 6.4+20231209-1
libncursesw6 - 6.4+20231209-1
libtinfo6 - 6.4+20231209-1
ncurses-base - 6.4+20231209-1
ncurses-bin - 6.4+20231209-1
ncurses-examples - 6.4+20231209-1
ncurses-term - 6.4+20231209-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ncurses package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.4+20231209-1').
